On November 13, 2009, we had an early snowfall, which covered the campus in more snow than I have ever seen in my five years at Sias University. I couldn't resist getting some photos before the students trampled it all. Photos by Gary L. Todd, Ph.D., Professor of History, Sias International University, Xinzheng, Henan, China. http://picasaweb.google.com/GaryLeeTodd/SiasInTheSnow#
